title: 5 Beds 2 Baths Room only
description:
We're offering a private bedroom in a spacious 5-bedroom, 2-bathroom home named 'Spark' in the heart of the Mission District. Room #1 is bright and cozy, perfect for a queen-sized bed. Rent is $995 per month, plus a fee for services and utilities.

Included services are monthly professional cleaning, unlimited high-speed WiFi, free use of the in-unit washer and dryer, and all utilities. Property highlights include a fully equipped kitchen, basic supplies, and a shared outdoor space.

We love to hear your inquiry. Please mention 'Spark' for more details!

title: One bedroom for an extra roommate. Address 399 Ellington Ave SF
description: Looking for ONE additional roommate, easy going, non smoker. We’re 2 ladies and 2 guys all have good jobs; cats in the house. Nice corner bedroom with lots of light, sharing kitchen and 2 bathrooms, front deck, patio; SFSU, CCSF, markets, bus lines close by.

title: Private room for rent
description:
We are looking for a new roommate to fill this vacant unfurnished room in a 4b1.5b in SOMA available starting August 26th. We are looking for someone considerate, nice, and respectful of the shared space. Also open to being friends and hangout in our free time. We highly preferring people in their 20s, any gender.

Current Roommates: 
Roommate 1: M (M, 23): Currently working in at a startup doing software. Likes to stay active, read, hike and make music in his free time. Recently graduated from undergrad and moved to sf from Florida a couple of months ago. 

Roommate 2: J: (M, 23) Also engineering and recently moved to SF also from Florida. Like to stay active through sports, swimming, volleyball, reading. Also loves exploring the city and the greater bay area. 

There are 2 vacant rooms (including this listing) in this apartment starting in September.

This unit comes unfurnished. This apartment includes in unit laundry, air conditioning, and an outdoor patio. Located on Harrison and 6th Street. 15 minute walk close access to downtown, Caltrain + Bart stations and located close to Dwight D Eisenhower Highway for easy commute and union square. No designated parking, but street parking not hard to get. There is also a second unit open August 16th, that is 1390/month. 

First month's rent and security deposit required by the landlord. We are on a month to month lease and looking for someone staying at least 6 months if not more. Units are unfurnished and utilities paid separately. 

Please let me know if you are interested in the unit and would like to get a tour of the place and meet the current roommates. Reach out to us either through this facebook message or reach out to @justinryan0 on instagram.

title: Private room for rent
description:
Private bedroom for rent. 
One bedroom for rent in a four bedroom/ two bathroom duplex in West Oakland. We are located on the second floor. Fully equipped kitchen with washer/dryer in-unit. This room comes unfurnished.

About a 10-12 minute walk to West Oakland BART, down the street from Sharif’s Market and a few minutes away from entrances to 80 freeway and 880. 

Street parking only. Garbage is paid by the landlord, all other utilities (PG&E, EBMUD, and Internet) is not included in the rent. It is divided evenly between the other roommates. 

The room is $800.00 a month. There is a one time deposit of $1,000.00. Both will be due upon moving in. 

Looking for a roommate to move in starting August 1st. 12 month lease minimum. There are four other roommates, three males and one female. 

Contact me for more information or if you would like to schedule an in person viewing.

title: Private room for rent
description:
Hey friends! One of our roommates is moving out, and we’re looking for someone awesome to take their place in our 3BR/2BA apartment in Nob Hill — literally the best location in SF.

3 bedrooms
2 bathrooms
Extra study/storage room
Fully functional kitchen
Utilities around $50/month
Cleanliness is a must — we like to keep the place tidy!

The location is unbeatable — close to public transit, groceries, restaurants, bars, and everything else SF has to offer. DM me if you or someone you know is looking! Move-in date flexible but sooner is better.

We value a really clean public environment for everyone. The current roommate is moving out and it will be unfurnished and very tide.

title: 4 Beds 1.5 Baths Apartment
description:
Hi All!

We're looking for two new roommates for August! Rent for rooms is $1075/mo and $1350/mo. 

Room 1 - $1075/mo - The room is ~175 sqft with big bay windows overlooking the enchanting Sutro Forest (entrance two blocks up), and Grattan Playground (basketball/tennis courts + soccer field next door). The room gets lots of natural light. It also has a large closet. 

Room 2 - $1350/mo - The room is the largest in the apartment at 14'x16', it has a turret in the corner with large bay windows with the same view as room 1. 

The apartment features a large living room with big bay windows (with the same view). It also features a kitchen (w/ dishwasher), a laundry/dryer room, and (non-official) roof access. It is a 4br/split bath, and we're a 5 min walking distance from 6, 7, 43 and N. 10 min walk to GGP/Upper Haight. Apartment is rent-controlled.

The roommates are M, M/36, a rapper and data scientist educator, and K, M/31, a violinist working in diversity and inclusion. We are friendly and will do stuff together, but most important to us is that everyone be able to do their own thing happily while remaining respectful of one another. 420 friendly. Pet friendly. We are open to both short-term and longer term roommates.

If you're interested - shoot me a line with a little bit about yourself, why you're looking for housing, what you’re looking for, and how long you're looking to stay. Please include links to social media/linkedin and the best number to reach you.

Let us know if you’re interested and tell us a bit about yourself! We’d love to find someone who’ll be a good fit for the home

title: 1 Bed 1 Bath - House
description:
1 Bed 1 Bath - House

Thelma St, Hayward, CA 94541, United States

***PRIOR TO BE GIVEN TO STUDENTS***

SINGLE Private Room for Rent – Available July 20th!

Deposit: $750
Rent: $750/month + utilities (~$150)
Lease: Month-to-month

We’re a friendly, community-focused chiropractic house looking for a new roommate to share our cozy 4-bedroom home!

🏡 About the Home:
Quiet neighborhood, just 7 minutes from campus!
Conveniently close to Target, Costco, Southland Mall, grocery stores, and more.

Roommates are quiet and keep to themselves. Shared kitchen & bathroom with two housemates (Q4 & Q8). In-unit laundry, central A/C & heat, plus a spacious backyard with fruit trees and a fire pit.

Private and unfurnished.

title: 2 habitaciones 1 baño - Departamento
description:
Hey everyone! I am looking for someone to take over my bedroom in a 2-bed 1-bath apartment near Lake Merritt. I have lived with my roommate for the past year but I am moving closer to my university. It is a very clean and comfortable space, and looking to have it filled by August first, preferably by another woman.

The Room: 
It is cozy with great lighting. The room can comfortably fit a twin bed, a desk, a dresser, and some storage. It has two windows, a closet, and a cozy nook for your bed or desk. If needed, a twin bed can be provided.

The Apartment: 
It is commuter-friendly, a 10-minute walk to Lake Merritt BART, and within one block of 5 different bus routes that take you straight to 12th or 19th st BART stations. If you have a car, there is ample street parking.

The unit has a fully furnished living room and kitchen, but if you would like to bring your additions, my current roommate can coordinate space for you. The unit has hardwood floors, great light throughout, and updated appliances/kitchen. The bathroom has ample storage and a bathtub/shower combo. There is a laundry mat directly across the street, making it easy for regular laundry.

The building is mostly young women and families, and we have built a close community while living here. It is a busy neighborhood, so there is a good amount of foot traffic but we have not had any issues while living here. Our neighborhood is very walkable, close to many restaurants and grocery stores.

My Roommate:
My roommate has a small, quiet dog, but no additional pets are allowed. The dog is very friendly and well-behaved. My roommate is a hybrid worker, so she wfh 2-3 days a week. We take turns dividing house chores and have been able to maintain a clean and comfortable environment.

If you’re interested, please message me so we can learn more about you and set up a time to meet! I can provide more images of the common spaces and the apartment upon request.

description:

Hi! We’re Karina and Fernanda, two Brazilian girls living in San Francisco, and we’re looking for a new roommate to share our apartment!

The apartment has 3 bedrooms (two large and one smaller) and 1 bathroom. The location is amazing — just 3 blocks from Chinatown, an 11-minute walk to City College Chinatown campus, and about 15 minutes from Polk Street.

title: Private room for rent
description:
SMALL BEDROOM FOR 1 PERSON. LOCATED ON THE 3RD FLOOR. AVAILABLE NOW.

***PICTURES CAME FROM WHEN THE HOUSE WAS FOR SALE. FURNITURES WERE FOR SHOW AND NOT OURS.***

All utilities - water, electricity, & internet are included in the monthly rent. 

Housemates are 6 adults / grown ups, and 1 kinder age.

The below are the shared spaces located on the 2nd floor:
- Kitchen
- 2 bathrooms
- Backyard
- Laundry

There's only street parking - daytime is easy, night time is a challenge.

Super close to freeway - Highway 101, going to SF Downtown, Bay Bridge, & Daly City. Also close to Bayshore Blvd. & Cow Palace.  

Muni Bus lines include 8 & 8BX - Bayshore, 9 & 9R - San Bruno, 56 - Ruthland, 91 - 3rd St./19th Ave., & T Train - 3rd St. line.

We have 3 pet parrots, which is already handful. So we're sorry, but no pets for renters.

Smoking can be done in the backyard or outside the gate in front of the house. None of us smokes.

We are quiet people. Only my 5 year old daughter runs around the house. She likes lying down / playing / dragging herself on the floor, so we all have indoor-only slippers in the house. We ask our renter to have their own indoor-only slippers, and not walk in the house with outdoor shoes.

The lease is month to month basis with contract signing, so it's easy to leave when you need to, just notify us when your last day is confirmed.

No credit check.

When decided to rent, we will need 1st month's pay and $500 security deposit that you will get back if you decide to leave.

If interested for viewing, please text me (Cathy) at [hidden information]. Thanks!

title: 3 Beds 1 Bath - Apartment
description:
🏡 Rooms Available in Inner Richmond

Hi everyone!
We’re looking for two sweet, kind, clean, and easygoing housemates to join our lovely home in Inner Richmond. Currently, I am one people in the house and looking for two new roommates.

✨ About the house:
The house has 3 bedrooms, 1 living room, 1 dining room, and 1 study room. It’s a spacious, cozy, and friendly place with a private laundry inside the house (not coin-operated — it’s ours only) and a nice backyard to enjoy.

✨ About the rooms:
 • One room will be available in early July.
 • The other room will be available in mid-August.
Both rooms will be unfurnished. The home will be almost unfurnished Because One of our housemates, who’s been living here for over 3 years, is moving out. If you have your own furniture that would be nice also.

✨ About us:
I’ve been living here for 1 year and i am hoping to find people planning to stay long-term. The lease will be for 1 year, then month-to-month after.one of my roommate is gonna move end of the june other one is mid august. 

✨ Utilities:
Utilities are not included but usually come to around $80/month.

✨ Pets:
 We can accept a cat, but only after August because my roommate already has two cats, and they will be gone in August.

✨ Location:
Inner Richmond, in a lovely neighborhood with great transit options, shops, and restaurants nearby.

✨ Availability:
 • Room 1: Available early July

If you think you’d be a good fit, please send me a message with a little bit about yourself. We’d love to meet you!

description:

9.5 x 9.5 room with closet for $1,100 (utilities not included).

title: Private room for rent
description:
Available August 1st, a room in our older, cozy four-bedroom house in the Sunset near 19th Ave. and Judah (close to the following MUNI lines: N, 7, 28 & 29). We're about a block from the Irving St. corridor which has a variety of restaurants, shops and grocery stores all within walking distance. Also, within walking distance is the Sunset branch of the public library, a Wal-Greens and the Post Office. We're a short bus ride away from Stonestown and San Francisco State University, and we're also a short ride on the N from the UCSF Parnassus campus. The house is 2 blocks from Golden Gate Park and about 2 miles away from Ocean Beach. We're also not far from Cole Valley and the The Haight. 


The room is fairly large (see pictures), it has a westward facing window and hardwood floors. The current roommate is willing to leave the closet, bed and the couch for $80. 


Our house has central heating and a washer and dryer (not coin operated) so you don’t have to drag your laundry to the laundromat! We also have a full kitchen with a dishwasher and a breakfast nook. There's a shared bathroom, a back yard and parking is available too! Additionally, we recently purchased new living room furniture (pic of living room included below)! 

Rent is $925 per month, plus utilities that range from $150-$200+ per month (in the colder months PG&E tends to be higher hence the range). Total move in cost is $2,050 (first and last month’s rent plus security deposit). 

About us: We're three 3 gay males in our 20's to mid-40’s. 

Aaron: 46, works from home as a legal writer M-F. In his spare time he goes to the gym, reads a lot, watches a lot of movie (big fan of the Criterion channel) and studies French. He's also vegan. 

Toren: 41, works in the mental health field, and mostly works from home M-F. Introvert who appreciates the arts and nature. 

Alex: 24, works outside the home M-F, in his spare time he likes to be active, play video games and and is a music lover. 

We tend to keep the house pretty quiet, especially after 10pm. We also do a fairly good job of keeping the common areas clean. Everyone is friendly and gets along, but we don’t often hangout as a group. We also don't really drink and smoking of any kind is not allowed in the house. Pets are unfortunately not allowed either. 

So if you are looking for a room in a quiet, cooperative and respectful home we'd love to hear from you! Reply to this ad with a bit about yourself and we'll be in touch to schedule a meeting. Thanks!

Please reply to this: https://sfbay.craigslist.org/sfc/roo/d/san-francisco-room-available-in-gay/7862905701.html

title: Private room for rent
description:
We have bedrooms available in our 4 bedroom and 2 bathroom home in Daly City (Serramonte area). The rental unit is in the second level of the house with a total of 12-steps stairs.

The current residents consist of two senior couples. One couple lives in the master bedroom with their own bathroom. The other couple lives in one bedroom and sharing the bathroom with the other two available bedrooms. 

Since this is a shared household, we are looking for single occupants only per bedroom. 

📌 First room: Medium sized private bedroom (11.5 ft x 12.5 ft) = $1100.00 monthly rent (Includes utilities) + $1000.00 deposit to move in. 

📌 Second room: Small private bedroom (9.5 ft x 10 ft) $1000.00 monthly rent (Includes utilities) + $1000.00 deposit to move in. 

✅ Minimum of 6-month lease contract required 

✅ Great location within the Peninsula!  Located near Hickey and Callan Blvd. in Daly City; it’s near Serramonte mall, medical offices, Gellert park, shopping centers, restaurants and laundromats. 5 minutes away from Pacifica; 12 minutes away from SFO Airport. 

✅ No in-house laundry. Laundromats are within 2 - 4 blocks away. 

✅ Sorry, no animals allowed since it’s a shared household. Non-smoking and drug-free home. 

✅ Street-parking only (no street cleaning). Bus stop is 4 houses away. 

✅ Must pass background and credit check. 

Please feel free to send me a private message for any questions or to schedule an appointment to view the property, along with a small introduction of yourself. Salamat po.

title: Private Room For Rent
description:
Room #3 is available for rent in our "Junction" home in West Oakland. This bright and spacious room features large windows, a private bathroom, and a roomy closet for your convenience. Rent is $695/month, with an additional fee for utilities and services.

Monthly cleaning of common areas
Quick maintenance support
Lockout and key replacement

Utilities: electricity, gas, high-speed Wi-Fi, water, sewer, trash, and recycling

Essentials restocked: laundry detergent, toilet paper, paper towels, dish soap, and cleaning supplies

Located near cafes, shops, and parks in West Oakland, this home offers a convenient and vibrant living experience.

Contact me today and mention "Junction" to schedule a virtual tour!

title: 3 Beds 1 Bath Apartment
description:
I am making this post for my former teacher/mentor. One room available in upstairs flat, for rent now: comfortable, high ceilings, big windows. The whole apartment has lots of natural light and great plants. Sharing a well-equipped kitchen, washer/dryer, and bathroom. Limited closet space and up one long flight of stairs. Lots of nearby restaurants, easy walk to grocery stores, public transit options, arts & culture. Utilities included.

House is the beloved longtime home of a San Francisco native, theatre artist, educator and community member. He is in his 70's, has lived with roommates of different generations, and has great stories to tell. He would be most excited to live with an artist and/or someone who loves San Francisco and its cultures. One very sweet and loving cat lives here; we are not able to have another pet.

To schedule a time to come see the place, please reach out with some relevant details about yourself, your work & schedule, and what your moving timeline is. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: Private room for rent
description:

Zillow link for more photos on request! 

The Room: the room is 12’ x 12.5’ with a large closet: 69”x24”. The windows are south facing! 

Amenities: A sunny living room, in-unit laundry, a spacious kitchen, dishwasher, a large shared bathroom (dual sinks) and great roommates!

About Us: We are two women and one man in our late 20s/early 30s and a friendly German Shepherd (Hazel). We like to balance communal living practices (e.g. shared dinners, movie nights, etc) with enjoying the individual privacy that our spacious apartment and thick walls grant.

We’re looking for someone who:
-exhibits kindness, empathy, & mutual respect
-is LGBTQIA, 420, & dog-friendly

title: 4 Beds 2 Baths Apartment
description:
My name is Alex and we're looking for a roommate.
 
The house is in North Mission, between Valencia and Guerrero, and a short walk to the 16th street BART and its fairly easy to get to Mission Bay, Parnassus, and ZSFG by shuttle/bus. The room dimensions are roughly 10 x 12 ft, with a roughly 3 x 4 ft closet. The rent for this room is $1125, with a security deposit of $1120. Earliest move in is Nov 9.
 
We like to keep our common areas fairly clean, and the unit comes with a dishwasher, in-building laundry, a spacious outdoor area in the back that we share with other tenants in the building, and central heating. We also have a cleaner that comes every 2 weeks and keeps our common areas clean. Most of the apartment is furnished already in the common areas, so you'll probably only need to end up bringing the stuff you want to keep in your room. There is no attached garage, but there is a bike storage room and an additional storage area downstairs to keep miscellaneous items. It's at a super convenient location for commuting, and just blocks away from Dolores Park as well!
 
We also have a cat in the house who is very social and loves to cuddle, but we cannot take an additional cat or dog unfortunately. 
 
 
* The room is furnished in the photos, but will be empty and clean before you arrive.
 
 
 
About us:
Andrew (27M): Hi!  I like to play tennis, read sci-fi and history, ski, run, bike, and bake things to share. Excited to meet you!
 
Noah (26M): Hey! I'm a BMI PhD student at UCSF. I enjoy cooking, hiking, movies, video games, and exploring the Bay. Looking forward to meeting you! 

Alex (26M): Hey! I work at UCSF in a clinical research lab. I'm interested in going to grad school in the future. I love to watch movies, hike, and I'm not a huge fan of cooking.

title: Private Room For Rent
description:
We are looking for a mid 20's-mid 30's female roommate to join or quirky, charming, 3bed/1bath home in the Excelsior neighborhood!

Room #2 ($1450/month) will be available August 15th and Room 1 ($1550/month) will be available mid September (you could switch rooms to the larger one at that date, or it would be great for two friends looking to live together!)

It's a very large, open, and spacious house with a large kitchen, small wet bar area, and a shared backyard with a beautiful lemon tree. We have a laundry room with in unit washer/dryer, and a driveway for parking. Utilities are included in rent price, and deposit is $1000. Lease length is negotiable but preferably 6+ months.

Preferably no animals, at least until the second room is available in mid September.

About us! 
I'm Maddy, a 29 year old fashion designer/artist and I have two very cuddly cats, Ash & Leo. I will be moving out mid September, but my roommate Jess will be staying as well as her service dog Draco, who is the sweetest doberman.

Please feel free to DM me if you have any questions or interest!

title: 13 Beds 4 Baths Apartment
description:
🌟 Bright, Remodeled Private Rooms in Prime North Beach/Chinatown 🌟

Welcome to 673 Broadway –  not your typical SRO, more of a boutique co-living space. This newly renovated 13-unit building offers a clean, fresh, and comfortable living experience right in the heart of Chinatown.

✨ Highlights:
✅ Private rooms with your own sink and mirror
✅ Bright, modern interiors with brand new kitchens & bathrooms shared among a small number of residents
✅ Water, garbage, and WiFi included 
✅ Private PG&E electricity meters – tenants pay their own electricity
✅ On-site laundry for your convenience
✅ Two shared patios for residents
✅ Bike-friendly area with a Walk Score of  100 – everything you need is right outside your door
✅ Flexible lease terms ( 6-12 months)
🛏️ Unfurnished and furnished options available for an additional fee.
🚭 No smoking. Sorry, no pets.
📍 Incredible Location: Steps to cafes, markets, public transit, and all the character North Beach and Chinatown have to offer.
💰 Monthly Rent: Starting at $895/month (varies by room size, lease terms, and furnishing).

Experience a different kind of SRO – bright, updated, and thoughtfully designed.   

Message now or visit 673broadway.com for more details and to apply online!

title: 1 Bed 1 Bath - Apartment
description:
Hey there!

I'm looking for a friendly and considerate roommate to share my comfortable two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment. If you appreciate having your own space and value a convenient location, this might be the perfect fit.

The apartment is well-suited for shared living, with the bedrooms located on opposite sides, providing us both with plenty of privacy.

The apartment contains:
- Two Bedrooms, Two Bathrooms: You'll have your own spacious bedroom and private bathroom.
- Full Kitchen
- Living & Dining Room: Its separate so it is quite spacious
- Balcony:  Good for plant if you are into that
- Parking Spot: A tandem spot in the building's garage.
- Laundry Options: There's a laundry room in the building, or a convenient laundromat right across the street.
- NO PETS: Sorry!

Location:
This location is pretty great – it's quiet but still super convenient to get around:

- Just a short drive (under 5 minutes) to the highway and the BART station, making trips into the city or around the Bay Area a breeze.
- A fantastic Korean supermarket is just a 10-minute walk away. 
- The nearest BART station is also walkable, approximately 20 minutes away.  5-minute drive
- A quick 10-minute drive to South San Francisco and San Francisco.

About Me (Your Potential Roommate):
I'm a 33-year-old working professional in the tech industry. I work from home during the week but head into the office once a week. When I'm not working, I enjoy staying active through dancing, unwinding with some video games, getting in a good workout, or just hanging out with friends around the Bay. I’m looking for a roommate who is respectful of our shared living space, responsible with the bills, and enjoys a generally peaceful atmosphere at home.

Rent: Your share would be $1,469 per month (the total apartment rent is $2,938).
Internet: Expect to pay around $32 per month.
Utilities: These typically average around $40 per month for your share, but may vary slightly.

Move-In Cost: The move-in fee is the first month's rent ($1,469) plus a security deposit of $750, totaling $2,219.

To make sure we're a good match as roommates, I'd appreciate it if you could provide:
A completed roommate questionnaire.  
(https://docs.google.com/document/d/16xA8qZvR9eh0OwZffUoE0Twgn_qsBD8H-sn0YxdievI/edit?usp=sharing) - make a copy and fill it out

If this sounds like a good fit for you, I'd love to hear more about you! Please send me a message about yourself.  
Looking forward to connecting!

title: 3 Beds 1 Bath Apartment
description:
My roommate Karin and I are looking for a female roommate to fill an open room in our 3 bed, 1 (split) bath, spacious apartment in the heart of Hayes Valley on November 1. Located directly on Hayes Street by Salt and Straw, and steps away from Outdoor Voices, Ritual Coffee, and a cute neighborhood park! It’s a spacious apartment with renovated closets, hardwood floors, in-unit W/D, dishwasher and a separate dining room and living room. And our open bedroom gets the most natural light of all the rooms!

Rent: $1795.50
Move-In: Nov 1
Term: Month to month but looking for long term

About us: We are in our late 20s, work in tech + fashion and appreciate having a cozy place to come home to after work to relax. We like to do our own thing but enjoy catching up at home after a long day, movie nights/roommate dinners, and spending weekends out in the city! We are respectful and clean in our living areas and looking for someone similar, and excited to find a new roommate who will enjoy living here with us 🙂

Apartment Includes:
- 3 renovated bedrooms with hardwood floors & closets,with built-in shelves and drawers
- Large living room with pseudo fireplace and dining room with built-in cabinets
- 1 split bathroom (separate room for toilet)
- Remodeled kitchen with dishwasher, high end cabinets, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances
- Commercial grade stacked washer/dryer (not coin operated!)
- Garbage and water included in the rent, utilities and internet are separate
- Street parking only

Highlights:
- Tons of natural light throughout the apartment & bedrooms. The open bedroom gets the most natural light!
- 10 min walk to MUNI, 15 min walk to BART
- No smoking and no pets, including support animals

title: Private Room For Rent
description:
Looking for a new roommate to join Nora and Charlotte in our sunny rent-controlled Victorian flat two blocks from the heart of the Castro. We have a three bedroom, one and a half bathroom apartment on the third floor. The room is a medium size and L shaped with a beautiful view of the city and a lot of direct sunlight. It has hardwood floors and a spacious closet. The kitchen is very large and we have a small sunny dining room. We also have a shared backyard.

All furniture in the first two photos is available except the yellow arm chair.

About the neighborhood
The Castro is safe. It's a dynamic neighborhood with great cafes, restaurants, organic grocery stores, a tennis court, dog park, and a cool laundromat a couple blocks away (no laundry in the building). Philz is half a block away! Mission Dolores Park is a 10 minute walk. The MUNI underground is five minutes away and multiple buses pass through the area. Walking distance to the Mission, Noe Valley, and Lower Haight.

About us: I am a 63-year-old artist, warm, kind, considerate, and financially stable (she, her). My other roommate is a 30-year old female (she, her) therapist, charming and kind.There is a small, adorable, very friendly cat named Yoshi living here too.

About you: I am looking for a roommate who has experience sharing space with others. Kind, friendly, tidy, keep a clean kitchen and common spaces. No smoking, no heavy drinking or drugs, financially responsible, with sound credit and employment history. Please bring proof of vaccination. Thank you.

Utilities + Sonic Internet currently $125 a month.

Before you move in I will need a credit report and proof of employment.

***PLEASE WRITE SOMETHING ABOUT YOURSELF AND WHAT IS MOST IMPORTANT IN YOUR LIVING SITUATION*** Thanks!

title: LOOKING FOR ROOMMATE
description:
Hey 👋🏻 my name is Joe and I am an architectural designing in the SF and looking for roommate/s!  I currently live in a studio which is sweet but overall think that more sqft and lower rent is a move I’d like to make in order to channel more money into future travel plans.

-avid painter 
-music nerd and live music enthusiast 
-skateboard + recently got a fixie bike
-explore new restaurants

I’m currently paying a little over 1,500 and would like to reduce this but open to discussion if more amenities are met etc

title: Private room for rent
description:

I’m a female entrepreneur working in tech and creative industry! This is a 2b1b apartment. The price includes utilities and internet. We will share the bathroom and the kitchen.
